article_title: Intuitive Surgical Expects Q4 Growth On Rising da Vinci Xi Sales

article_metadata.description: For the full year 2014, the company expects procedure volumes to have grown by 9% y-o-y, driven by a 6% rise in U.S. procedures and a 20% rise in international procedures. However, the higher procedure volumes towards the end of 2014 could not offset the company’s lackluster performance in the first half of the year. The company announced in its preliminary 2014 earnings release that its full year sales are likely to decline by 6% over the previous year to $2.13 billion.
article_metadata.author: Great Speculations
